Title: SugarCRM
Description: Sugar 5.0 available now!  SugarCRM is a complete CRM and groupware system for businesses of all sizes. Functionality includes sales force automation, marketing campaigns, support cases, project mgmt, calendaring, documents and more.  Runs on MS SQL Server and PHP.
HomeWiki:
SugarCRM is a complete CRM and groupware system for businesses of all sizes. Functionality includes sales force automation, marketing campaigns, support cases, project mgmt, calendaring, documents and more. Runs on MS SQL Server and PHP.

Sugar 5.0 available now!

To learn more about SugarCRM, visit any of the sites below:

  • Sugar Open Source Community
  • Sugar Forums
  • Sugar Wiki
  • Sugar Bug Tracker
